name: Plant Panic (Piermatteo_Bruno)
description:
"5 minutes. One plant. And a lot of things to dodge."

In Plant Panic you take care of a plant pot. That's it! Oh sorry, I forgot, there's also a tiny little detail: you can't let ANY fly, bee or other insects touch it.

If you can resist 5 minutes without getting hit, then congratulations! You'll have a great flower.
